page.title: 09Alton Saturday (2)
page.content: My Mum has a Vauxhall Carlton estate and my Dad has got a B.M.W. 323i. Every Saturday in town I buy a science fiction comic called 2000 A.D. and some sweets but I don't really have a favourite though. When I get back I would have my lunch which would be at about 1.00p.m. After that I would call on a friend or play football, or some other sport that I could play on my own. After that I might play on our computer. By then it would be supper time and I would have it watching the television. After that I would go to bed at around 10.00p.m.,get undressed, clean my teeth, switch the light out and go to bed.
